name: @opensrp/reducer-factory
description: Abstraction for creating other dux modules

scripts.test: cd ../../ && yarn test packages/opensrp-reducer-factory --verbose --collectCoverage=true && cd packages/opensrp-reducer-factory
scripts.test:watch: cd ../../ && yarn test packages/opensrp-reducer-factory --verbose --watch && cd packages/opensrp-reducer-factory
scripts.build: yarn run tsc && yarn run transpile && yarn run copy

author: Ona Engineering
